pop_room_locked: Continue playing to unlock more rooms!
notification_gen_text: {0} is ready to generate new items!
notification_chest_text: {0} is open, come see what items it holds!
notification_energy_text: Fantastic, you now have enough energy to play around!
tutorial_info_world_Play1: We should be able to find something on the playing board!
tutorial_info_merge_MergeCleaningTools1: First, let's Merge these Cleaning Items to get started.
tutorial_info_merge_MergeCleaningTools2: Now, Merge again with a locked item to unlock it.
tutorial_info_merge_GenCleaningSpray1: It's full of cleaning supplies. Tap it to get them out!
tutorial_info_merge_GenBucket1: Interesting! But, not what we need. Let's Tap it again!
tutorial_info_merge_MergeBucket1: Now, let's Merge just one more time!
tutorial_info_merge_Home1: Perfect, a Broom, just what we need! Let's go back and use it!
tutorial_info_world_Play2: Let's look at our playing board again.
tutorial_info_merge_GenCleaningSpray2: There should be more cleaning supplies here! Let's Tap it!
tutorial_info_merge_MergeCleaningSpray: Cleaning Spray again. We should Merge it, who knows what we will get?
tutorial_info_merge_MergeBucket2: Oooh, a Bucket! Well we know what to do with those. Right?
tutorial_info_merge_Task2: Of course! Two Buckets is a Broom. Who knew? Anyways, what was our next task again!
tutorial_info_world_Task3: I think I saw a Toolbox on the board.
tutorial_info_merge_MergeToolBox1: Let's start by merging those Lids!
tutorial_info_merge_MergeToolBox2: Now, what will these Parts give us?
tutorial_info_merge_MergeToolBox3: A Toolbox! But, it's closed! Maybe, Merging again will open it.
tutorial_info_merge_GenWrench1: Finally, it's open. Let's see what's inside!
tutorial_info_merge_GenWrench2: A Wrench? Not really suitable for repairing floor. Let's try again!
tutorial_info_merge_MergeWrench1: A Wrench again? I guess we need to start merging!
tutorial_info_merge_MergePliers1: Pliers, huh? We are getting closer and closer! And already have one, let's merge it!
tutorial_info_merge_Task4: A Hammer!! A perfect tool, suitable for everything! Well, almost everything.
error_loc_name: Failed to display correct item name!
convo_TutorialPart1_2: This place is... strange. What happened?
convo_TutorialPart1_4: Ooh. Hi there! Good thing I still remember you, my friend!
convo_TutorialPart1_5: But wait! I can't remember your name. Do you mind reminding me?
convo_TutorialPart2_0: {0}? Sounds familiar. Something is coming back to me!
convo_TutorialPart2_1: Uuuuh! No, got nothing. But, don't worry! I will do my best to remember.
convo_TutorialPart2_2: For now, let's see where we are!
convo_TutorialPart3_0: A mansion? And a locked gate!
convo_TutorialPart3_1: Well, let's see if there is someone inside who can help us.
convo_TutorialPart4_0: Uuuff! This must be the living room! It's do dirty!
convo_TutorialPart4_1: We need to do some cleaning before we can continue exploring this mansion.
convo_TutorialPart5_0: So much dust! The Broom broke too! How come???
convo_TutorialPart5_1: And we are only halfway done!
convo_TutorialPart6_0: Aaaah, much better! But, why is the floor so rotten?
convo_TutorialPart6_1: I fear it might break, and I will fall beneath it!!! SCARRYYY!
convo_TutorialPart6_2: Surely we should fix this first!
convo_TutorialPart7_0: You know what, since we have done so much already, why don't we continue?
convo_TutorialPart7_1: I know, let's start with the walls!
info_box_default: TAP an item to see it's info.
info_box_undo: TAP Undo to bring back your item.
info_box_crate_text: There is something inside the crate! MERGE next to it or use Gems to open it.
info_box_locker_text: This item is locked! MERGE with it or use Gems to unlock it.
info_box_bubble_text: This item is inside a bubble. Use Gems or Watch an Ad to pop the bubble.
info_box_gen_pre: MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {0}.
info_box_gen: TAP to get new items. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {0}.
info_box_gen_max: TAP to get new items. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_item: MERGE with the same item to get {0}.
info_box_item_max: This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_coll: TAP to collect {0} {1}. MERGE with the same item to get more {1}.
info_box_coll_max: TAP to collect {0} {1}. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!

info_box_gems.zero: TAP to collect {0} Gem. MERGE with the same item to get more Gems.
info_box_gems.one: TAP to collect {0} Gem. MERGE with the same item to get more Gems.
info_box_gems.other: TAP to collect {0} Gems. MERGE with the same item to get more Gems.

info_box_gems_max.zero: TAP to collect {0} Gem. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_gems_max.one: TAP to collect {0} Gem. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_gems_max.other: TAP to collect {0} Gems. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!

info_box_chest_Piggy: TAP to get Gold and Gems. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {0}.
info_box_chest_Energy: TAP to get Energy. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {0}.
info_box_chest_Item: TAP to get the items within.. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {0}.
info_box_chest_max_Piggy: TAP to get Gold and Gems. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_chest_max_Energy: TAP to get Energy. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_chest_max_Item: TAP to get the items within. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_chest_single_Piggy: TAP to get Gold and Gems.
info_box_chest_single_Item: TAP to get the items within.
info_box_chest_alt_Piggy: Full of Gold and Gems. Tap to get them out.
info_box_chest_alt_Energy: Full of Energy. Tap to get them out.
info_box_chest_alt_Item: Full of these items. Tap to get them out.
info_box_chest_locked: Unlock to get the items within. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {0}.
info_box_chest_max_locked: Unlock to get the items within. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_chest_timer: Don't wait. Speed up with Gems. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {0}.
info_box_chest_max_timer: Don't wait. Speed up with Gems. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
menu_inventory_description: Drag items from to the Inventory button to store them there. Tap on an item to put it on the board.
menu_inventory_pause: NOTE: Timers in the Inventory are paused!
energy_menu_label_a: Generating new items costs energy. Buy more Energy by watching an Ad or by using Gems.
energy_menu_label_a_alt: Generating new items costs energy. Buy more Energy by using Gems.
follow_menu_rate_label_1: Then please follow us to stay up to date!!!
note_menu_purchase_slow_text_a: Please wait till we handle your purchase! This usually takes 1-2 minutes.
note_menu_purchase_slow_text_b: If it takes too long, it might mean that your card has declined
note_menu_purchase_failed_declined: Your payment was declined. Try again later!
note_menu_purchase_failed_unavailable: In App Purchasing is disable in the settings
note_menu_purchase_failed_other: Failed to purchase the selected product. Try again later!

note_menu_not_enough_gems_text: You don't have enough Gems. Buy some from the Store.
note_menu_energy_ad_error_1: An error occurred when loading the ad
note_menu_energy_ad_error_2: Check your network or try again later!

note_menu_log_signed_in_Apple: You have successfully signed in to Apple.

note_menu_log_in_failed_Apple: Logging in to Apple failed. Try again later!
level_menu_label: Collect more Experience to level up!
level_menu_rewards_label: Your rewards for reaching the next level:

age_menu_label: Please select your age to continue.
conflict_label_b: Would you like to Use the Previous one or Create a New account?

confirm_label_need_gems: You don't have enough Gems! Buy some in the Shop!

confirm_label_reset: Are you sure you want to Reset the game? This action can't be undone! All your progress will be deleted!
confirm_label_locale: Please restart the game for the changes to take effect!
confirm_label_sell_gen: This item is rare and can be hard to get back!
confirm_label_sell_log_out: Are you sure you want to log out?
update_menu_label: A new version is available, please update the game to continue playing!
feedback_label_a: Your feedback is crucial to us!
feedback_label_b: Join us in shaping our journey by sharing your thoughts!
feedback_label_c: Please describe your issue clearly and in detail, so that we can properly assist you!
feedback_label_thanks: We appreciate your feedback, as your suggestions help us improve the game and deliver a better experience to all!
feedback_label_failure: Reporting failed, please try again later!
feedback_report_description_placeholder_: Please description the bug that you are experiencing...
Please description the performance issue that you are experiencing...
message_error: Couldn't view online data! Try again latter!
area_Garden_desc: Very forgotten indeed. I can't remember why I am here!
area_LivingRoom_desc: Since this is the 'Living' room, you can't die here!
area_Kitchen_desc: The kitchen is where all the cooking happens!
speech_greeting_0: Welcome back, {0}. How are you doing?
speech_greeting_3: Hi there! Who? It's me Julia!!! Whhaaaat? You forgat meee?!?
speech_greeting_4: Uuuh? Who might you be?! Ooooh, oops! It's my dear friend {0}.
speech_room_unlocked_LivingRoom: This must be the Living Room? Not very living is it?!
speech_room_unlocked_Kitchen: This is the Kitchen? Wow, couldn't be dirtier!
speech_Julia_random_0: What a cramped room. Not that I'm complaining, mind you!
speech_Julia_random_1: I really need a cup of coffee.
speech_Julia_random_2: Is it just me, or is today a perfect day for merging?
speech_Julia_random_3: They say that 42 is the meaning of life. I say, it just a number!
speech_Julia_random_4: I was born on  May 10, 2023. They call me Julia. You don't need my last name!
speech_Julia_random_6: PLEASE, don't hit me, I'll talk!
speech_Julia_random_9: Ever feel like the pieces just speak to you? No? Just me?
speech_Julia_random_10: I wonder if there's a world where everything is already merged. How boring!
speech_Julia_random_11: Did you know cats have five toes on their front paws but only four on their back ones?
speech_Julia_random_12: Ever notice how time flies when you're having fun?
speech_Julia_random_13: Why do they call it a 'building' if it's already built?
speech_Julia_random_14: What if clouds were actually made of cotton candy?
speech_Painting_-1: Is it a cat or a dog? I can't see through the dust!

speech_Painting_0.other: I have had better photos taken of me.

speech_Painting_1.zero: The pixels are so small, I can't see what it is. Well at least it looks nice.

speech_Painting_2.zero: Aah, yes. Abstract art! Nope, don't get it
speech_Painting_2.one: They say it's not about the beauty, but about the feeling when it comes to abstract art.

speech_Bookcase_-1.zero: I can't put anything in here, it will break
speech_Bookcase_-1.one: This thing has been in a better state.

speech_Bookcase_0.one: What should i put in here?

speech_Bookcase_1.zero: Interesting color, but not my taste

speech_TableLarge_-1.zero: So dirty. I can't put food on it!
speech_TableLarge_-1.one: I just wonder, how did this table break?

speech_TableLarge_0.zero: Aah, my new and shiny table!

speech_TableLarge_2.one: Everyone likes round tables! Well, except the ones that don't!

speech_Fridge_-1.one: This things melts everything i put in it. Is it just a big oven? I'm confused!

speech_Fridge_0.zero: Much better. It even has a working freezer.

speech_Fridge_1.zero: To eat, or not to eat?

speech_Fridge_2.one: Is it gold or yellow? I can't tell!

speech_Bed_-1.zero: I really don't want sleep on that bed!!!

speech_Bed_0.zero: No that's a bed to sleep in

speech_Bed_1.zero: To sleep, or not to sleep?

speech_Bed_2.one: Huh, look at that! It's a bed!

speech_BedsideTable_0.zero: I wonder, can I fit in there?

speech_BedsideTable_1.one: Does it pay taxes? I hope so!

speech_BedsideTable_2.one: Too bad it doesn't have any drawers!

task_group_Garden_desc: Someone forgot to do maintenance here!
task_group_LivingRoom_desc: Lets clean it up before we explore it!
task_group_BedRoom_desc: Lets make this room a place for dreaming!
task_group_KitchenRoom_desc: This will be the room where the best food is made!
